title: [BUG] OpenRouter + Anthropic models don't receive tool definitions correctly

logs.msg: Investigation: Tools DO work sometimes (list calls succeeded). Model intermittently outputs raw XML instead of using tool API. Separate error 'Invalid request: OpenAI: Provider returned error' occurred on retry. Need to: 1) Verify tools are consistently passed 2) Check if specific models have issues 3) Handle XML fallback gracefully
